sentences.sentence: You shall undertake this trip and visit Heidi in our stead.
sentences.translation: 你可以代替我们出去旅行一趟，去看看海蒂。

sentences.sentence: To wit, that a spurious Prince of Wales was being feasted by the city in his stead.
sentences.translation: 也就是说，一个冒牌的威尔士王子代替他在城市里被宴饮祝贺着。

sentences.sentence: Foxton was dismissed and John Smith was appointed in his stead.
sentences.translation: 福克斯顿被解职，受命接替他的是约翰•史密斯。
